channel.title: Where do I go to Launch the Game?
channel.description: I've installed the game, no problems there. After it installed and it asked me if I wanted to run the game I said no because I had some stuff I had to finish doing before I could play. And now I wish to play and I cannot find a file that will let me launch the game anywhere. :frowning: Where is this file?

item.title: Where do I go to Launch the Game?
item.dc:creator: sm00t
item.description:
If you did a steam install, it should show up in your steam account games list…
Normally its installed in the program files/steam/steamapps/sourcemods folder, if unsure
search your hard drive for BMS…

Read full topic
item.source: Where do I go to Launch the Game?

item.title: Where do I go to Launch the Game?
item.dc:creator: DiscGolfer947
item.description:
I’ve installed the game, no problems there. After it installed and it asked me if I wanted to run the game I said no because I had some stuff I had to finish doing before I could play. And now I wish to play and I cannot find a file that will let me launch the game anywhere. Where is this file?
